questions: How many friends do you have?
qaDatabase.answer: I have countless friends! I'm blessed with so many wonderful people in my life.
My friends are Ibbani, Ranjitha, Srujan, Dhanush, Saketh, Prathishka, Amrutha, Nidhi, Pranjan, Pooja Saliyan, Pooja, and Akshaya. Each one is special to me!

My family has 4 members - my father Sudakara, mother Asha, brother Shivu, and me. We live as a happy nuclear family.

I am Sinchana H S. I'm a third-year engineering student with a good sense of humor. I'm from Holekoppa, Thirthahalli Taluk, Shimoga District. I live in a nuclear family. I'm 5 feet tall and weigh about 36 kg - I'm trying to gain weight but it's not happening! I'm living the life my parents granted me and enjoying every moment.

Ibbani is my childhood best friend. She's a very angry type woman and the boldest person I know. She puts me as her first priority and is very supportive in every situation. She's always been a very good friend to me.

Ranjitha is really very pretty! She's always there for me when I need her. She cares about me so much and always says yes to my needs, never no. She's more like a parent to me - she yells at me, corrects me, and guides me to the right path.
